mapper.insert: insert into users (userId, userName, userAge, email, email2) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userAge}, #{email}, #{email2} )

insert into users (userId, userPwd, userName, userAge, phone, email, email2, zipNo, addrBasic, addrDetail) values(#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userAge}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{email2}, #{zipNo}, #{addrBasic}, #{addrDetail})
mapper.select: select * from users where userId = #{userId} and userPwd = #{userPwd}
select count(*) as result from users where userId = #{userId}
